intro.title: Paper Submission Portal
intro.description: Submit your research paper for IEEE InGARSS 2026. All submissions are handled through the EDAS conference management system. Please review the guidelines and complete the checklist below before submitting.
intro.cfpLinkText: → View Call for Papers & Topic List

checklistItems.label: Original Work
checklistItems.desc: My paper is original and not under review elsewhere.

checklistItems.label: English Language
checklistItems.desc: The Paper is written in English.

checklistItems.label: Valid Format
checklistItems.desc: The submission file is in .pdf format.

checklistItems.label: Page Limit
checklistItems.desc: The paper adheres to the page limit (up to 4 pages free).

checklistItems.label: IEEE Template
checklistItems.desc: I have used the standard IEEE Conference Template.

checklistItems.label: AI Disclosure
checklistItems.desc: I have disclosed any AI-generated content (<25%) in the acknowledgments.

checklistItems.label: Plagiarism Check
checklistItems.desc: I have verified that the content is original and properly cited.

checklistItems.label: Deadline Aware
checklistItems.desc: I understand the submission deadline is 30 May 2026.

guidelineItems.label: Originality
guidelineItems.text: Original, unpublished research not under review elsewhere.

guidelineItems.label: Page Limit
guidelineItems.text: Up to 4 pages (free). 5 pages: ₹1,000/$15, 6 pages max: ₹2,000/$30. See Registration for fees.

guidelineItems.label: Template
guidelineItems.text: Use standard IEEE Conference Template (A4 size).

guidelineItems.label: Blind Review
guidelineItems.text: Initial submission must not include author names or affiliations.

guidelineItems.label: AI-Generated Content Disclosure
guidelineItems.text: The use of AI-generated content (text, figures, images, code) must be disclosed in the acknowledgments section. Identify the AI system used and specify which sections contain AI-generated content with a brief explanation. AI use for editing and grammar enhancement does not require disclosure but is recommended. AI content less than 25%

guidelineItems.label: Plagiarism
guidelineItems.text: All submissions will be checked for plagiarism. Papers found to contain plagiarized material will be rejected. Ensure all content is original or properly cited.

guidelineItems.label: Registration
guidelineItems.text: At least one author must register at full (non-student) rate.
